name: Math Knight
description:
DESCRIPTION

a singleplayer game where you have to answer questions, Math questions to beat the game, The questions are random and computer generated, thanks to my epic skill and epic gear, lol

The Game is available for Android, Mac, and Windows, epic..

I made this game so that people or mainly young students can learn math and also have fun at the same time so that they don't feel bored

NOTES

there are a few animations that are kinda broke, thats because the game is rushed 

why?

because it was a submission for a science contest and of course there was a time limit

but overall the game works fine
